intro: Ischnosiphon elegans, commonly known as the elegant thornapple, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae, which includes many milkweed species. The plant is characterized by its slender, branching stems and clusters of small, white to pinkish flowers. Its leaves are opposite, elliptical, and often covered in fine hairs. Ischnosiphon elegans is primarily cultivated for its ornamental value and is sometimes grown as a houseplant.
